response.overview: In his new hour, filmed at Balboa Theatre in San Diego, which marks the 10th original under Huluâ€™s new Hularious banner, Barbosa shares his adventures in dating, controlling his temper, working on cars, and his views on current events. The special is directed by Jeff Tomsic and produced by Rotten Science.
response.title: Ralph Barbosa: Planet Bosa
